api-app.description: Creates a NestJS application under the `apps/{domain}/{name}

api-feature.description: Creates a NestJS feature library for an api under `libs/{domain}/api/{name}

client-app.description: Creates a Angular app under apps/{domain}/{name}-app

common-domain-lib.description: Creates a common node library that can be shared safely between Angular and Nest Applications libs/{domain}/common

common-model.description: Creates common models in the libs/{domain}/common/src/{models | validators} folders

data-access.description: Creates an Angular data-access project under a domain.

domain.description: Creates a client-app, client-api-app, common, and data-access projects

firebase-ngrx-store.description: Creates an firebase-store-store connecting to Firebase for realtime communication

material-form.description: Generates a material form component and any models defined via the inputs
